name: MAPLEBEAR INC. D/B/A INSTACART
description: Online grocery delivery and pick-up service.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to food delivery service, including food supply chains, employment classification, SNAP, and health and safety.
Issues related to consumer access, including SNAP policy.
Worker classification; PPE safe harbor (Helping Gig Economy Workers Act of 2020).
Monitoring of congressional action related to privacy and artificial intelligence.
Issues related to SNAP policy. Issues related to nutrition within the Medicare Advantage program. Issues relating to pricing.
